flexible_recipes.Description: Whether recipes can accept inputs from multiple installed mods.

alternate_unlock_maki.Description: Turn this on if you don't have ItemExtensions or if you want the alternate recipe unlock method for Fresh Salmon Maki.

alternate_unlock_unknowable.Description: Turn this on if you don't have SpaceCore or if you want the alternate recipe unlock method for the Unknowable Dish.
